Banner.Description: I’m a .NET Core Full-Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience, specialized in Web APIs. I build secure, scalable web and desktop applications with SQL Server/MySQL, clean architecture (SOLID, design patterns), and performance-focused solutions.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: .NET Core Full-Stack Developer with 2+ years of hands-on experience delivering scalable, high-performance web applications and enterprise systems.
Specialized in .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, and RESTful Web APIs, applying SOLID principles and proven design patterns for maintainable architecture.
Experienced in database design and optimization (SQL Server, MySQL) and modern frontends with Bootstrap and JavaScript.
Some of the technologies I work with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer (Full-Stack)
Description: Led full-stack development of enterprise applications using ASP.NET Core, MVC, and Web API.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs with optimized performance for seamless integrations.
Applied SOLID principles and patterns (Repository Pattern, Dependency Injection) for maintainable architecture.
Built automation and parallel processing solutions to improve system performance and work management efficiency.
Managed end-to-end delivery across multiple concurrent projects, from client communication to production deployment.
Troubleshot and resolved production issues to minimize downtime and ensure smooth feature releases.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelance & Contract Developer
Description: Custom ASP.NET Core web applications and REST API design/development.
Helped create and enhance a gym e-commerce website: product/catalog flows, UI refinements, performance improvements, and ongoing enhancements.
Desktop application development using WPF and .NET MAUI.
Third-party integrations (Google APIs and other services).
Database design, optimization, and migrations (SQL Server, MySQL).
Legacy .NET modernization, performance tuning, and ongoing support.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: PDF to Excel Report Converter (AI Extraction)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Built an automated PDF-to-Excel reporting solution using Google Claude API and OpenAI API to accurately extract and normalize client data. Delivered both a console app and a Web API with job queue automation for the CRM team to process reports reliably at scale.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Centralized Pricing System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Built a secure centralized pricing management system from scratch with multi-layer authentication and OTP. Implemented REST APIs, parallel processing for concurrent updates, and an optimized SQL Server schema for high-volume queries.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Graffiti Management System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a graffiti tracking platform for a US client with Google Maps integration and polygon marking to identify affected areas. Delivered a clean MVC architecture with Repository Pattern, modular design, and optimized MySQL queries.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Point of Sale (POS) System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Enhanced and maintained a Windows desktop POS system with a modern WPF UI, reliable transaction processing, and optimized database operations using Entity Framework and SQL Server. Added real-time analytics dashboards and integrations with existing business systems.
